com.shopwiki.roger.rpc
Class RpcWorker

java.lang.Object
  com.shopwiki.roger.rpc.RpcWorker

public class RpcWorker
extends java.lang.Object

A glue class that packages together a RequestHandler and the RabbitMQ plumbing needed to use it. The user is expected to instantiate these in a RpcServer.WorkerFactory. However, it is also common to just use the BasicWorkerFactory implementation.

Author:
rstewart
